summary: friendly reminder that dan has regularly been going to therapy for a few years now, so even if he's not in a great place right...
body: friendly reminder that dan has regularly been going to therapy for a few years now, so even if he’s not in a great place right now, he has a lot of support from his friends and family and the mental health professionals he sees and is likely on track for some healing :)

blog.name: radical-conceptussy
blog.title: Radical Conceptussy
blog.description: Just a nerd trying to find their way and a 100% proud straight ally for Daniel Howell

body:
Orchids for Dan ❤️

Because of how beautiful Dan’s orchids are, I’m going to start a new project.

If you’re on twitter and if you have any, please could you take pictures of your own orchids and tweet them with the hashtag #orchidsfordan

Please don’t let this flop, I posted a tweet about it which you can find by either using the hashtag or at my twitter. If you guys could spread the word about it, I would be incredibly grateful. Let’s do something nice for him! 🤗 💕

blog.name: natxpack
blog.title: Vellichor
blog.description: If I'm not reading, I'm probably asleep or on the Internet (Natalie: She/Her)

body:
Satan’s Little Helper ♦️

@danielhowell

Please don’t repost/remove caption! All likes and reblogs make the trip to hell much nicer

Also! This is my drawthisinyourstyle post! If you want to participate you can post here, or on Instagram (I’m more active on there tbh so that’s the better place but this is fine too)! Also, feel free to change the pose up if you want! It just needs to remain visually similar in clothing and such. So good luck! I look forward to seeing more entries!

Art IG: natxpack

Shirt design from: @nyab_formerly_tipsygypsy on IG

blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

tags: i really hope he's doing okay
summary: I don't know if it's because of all the uncalled for drama and horrible comments made  about him lately but this genuinely makes...
body:
I don’t know if it’s because of all the uncalled for drama and horrible comments made about him lately but this genuinely makes me feel sad 😔

I really hope this is just some more of Dan’s humour and not because he has seen and been effected by all of those spiteful assholes.

reblog.comment:
